text: Oleksandr Oleksandrovych Omelchenko ( Oleksandr Oleksandrovyč Omel'čenko; 9 August 1938 – 25 November 2021) was a Ukrainian politician. He was Mayor of Kyiv from 1999 until 2006. He was also a member of the Verkhovna Rada (Ukrainian parliament) from 2007 to 2012. Omelchenko was a candidate for President of Ukraine in the 2004 election as a member of the Unity Party. Omelchenko died on 25 November 2021 from problems caused by COVID-19 in Kyiv, aged 83.Kyiv ex-mayor Omelchenko dies, Interfax-Ukraine (25 November 2021) ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Kyiv Category:Politicians from Kyiv Category:Ukrainian mayors
title: Oleksandr Omelchenko
